attributes.action: Petition the get the government to change laws and regulations on AIs
attributes.additional_details: If not controlled, the AIs could eventually cause situations where they are uncontrollable and could cause serious harm to people and their belongings
attributes.background: We would like the government to consider creating rules to stop the dangers of the Ais from overstepping and creating dangerous situations where they can no longer be controlled

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about risks posed by AI, but we're not sure exactly what regulations you'd like the Government or Parliament to introduce.

The Government has published plans to regulate AI, which you can read here: https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/ai-regulation-a-pro-innovation-approach-policy-proposals/outcome/a-pro-innovation-approach-to-ai-regulation-government-response

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Amend the DPDI Bill to protect us from harmful Artificial Intelligence (AI): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652982

Full ban on use of AI applications in the United Kingdom: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650790

If there's something else you want the Government to do you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
